system.description: Sometimes referred to as a “jungle-style magazine”, this accessory binds two machine pistol, rifle, SMG, machine gun, or shotgun box magazines together for quicker reloading, allowing the user to perform one reload at 1 less Combat Point, and negates the need to reach into a pack to retrieve the stored magazine. The character must be proficient in the weapon he is using in order to take advantage of this accessory. A character may also duct tape two magazines together for the same effect but the weapon gets a -5 penalty to Stealth checks to hide the weapon when using this method. The clip must be purchased for a specific type of magazine, and is not compatible with any other magazine. The clip can not hold two magazines that have a capacity of more than 50 cased rounds, or 10 shelled rounds
